objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Mystery/Detective themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Mystery/Detective narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Mystery/Detective lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a mysterious problem to solve involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a mystery context
Students engage in mystery themed role-play about daily routines and habits using slang register
Students create original mystery themed content about daily routines and habits in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Mystery/Detective scenario?
What clue or investigation might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Mystery/Detective story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Mystery/Detective perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this mystery scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Mystery/Detective situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using slang register in mystery context
Character B: Responding in slang register within mystery theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with clue
daily routines and habits with investigation
daily routines and habits with suspect

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Mystery/Detective theme: Investigation, puzzles, solving problems

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Mystery/Detective themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
